law.catch_line: If requested by a juvenile court or by any other court in a proceeding that involves the interest of...

text.section: If requested by a juvenile court or by any other court in a proceeding that involves the interest of a minor, the Department shall provide the services described in this title.
The Department shall provide the employees necessary for any services that a juvenile court orders.
The Department shall cooperate with the juvenile court in carrying out the objectives of this title and Title 3, Subtitles 8 and 8A of the Courts Article.
